entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023
